    • traceRay

      public Color traceRay​(Ray ray)
      If the ray intersect the geometry, paint in the final color
      Specified by:
      traceRay in class RayTracerBase
      Parameters:
      ray - The ray to check if he intersect the geometry (Ray)
      Returns:
      The color to paint the pixel (Color)

    • calcColor

      private Color calcColor​(Intersectable.GeoPoint geopoint, Ray ray)
      Calculate the color of the receiving point
      Parameters:
      geopoint - The intersection point (and the intersected geometry) (GeoPoint)
      ray - The intersect ray (Ray)
      Returns:
      The final color (Color)

    • calcColor

      private Color calcColor​(Intersectable.GeoPoint intersection, Ray ray, int level, double k)
      Calculate the color on specific point on the object
      Parameters:
      intersection - The intersected geometry object with the closest intersection point with the ray
      ray - The intersect ray
      level - The number of intersection levels the ray intersect (the depth of continuous ray to check)
      k - The attenuation factor of the intersected ray
      Returns:
      The color of the point

    • calcLocalEffects

      private Color calcLocalEffects​(Intersectable.GeoPoint intersection, Ray ray, double k)
      Calculate the diffuse and the specular on the object
      Parameters:
      intersection - The intersected geometry object with the closest intersection point with the ray
      ray - The intersect ray
      k - Attenuation factor of the impact of ray on point
      Returns:
      The diffuse and the specular on the object

    • calcDiffusive

      private Color calcDiffusive​(double kD, Color lightIntensity, double nl)
      Calculate the diffuse of the light source on the intersection point in the intersected geometry object
      Parameters:
      kD - Diffuse attenuation factor
      nl - The normalized vector from the position point (of the light source) to intersection point dot (product) the normal vector to the object
      lightIntensity - The light intensity of the light source
      Returns:
      The diffuse (intensity) color on the object (Color)

    • calcSpecular

      private Color calcSpecular​(double kS, Vector l, Vector n, Vector v, int nShininess, Color lightIntensity, double nl)
      Calculate the specular of the light source on the intersection point in the intersected geometry object
      Parameters:
      kS - Specular attenuation factor
      l - The normalized vector from the position point to attached point
      n - The normal vector to the object
      v - The direction vector from the camera
      nShininess - Shininess attenuation factor
      lightIntensity - The light intensity
      Returns:
      The specular intensity color on the object (color)

    • transparency

      private double transparency​(LightSource light, Vector l, Vector n, Intersectable.GeoPoint geoPoint)
      Calculate partial shadow
      Parameters:
      light - The light source
      l - The ray from the light source
      n - The normal to the intersection point
      geoPoint - The intersection point
      Returns:
      The shadowing factor (Transparency factor)

    • findClosestIntersection

      private Intersectable.GeoPoint findClosestIntersection​(Ray ray)
      Find all the intersection between the ray and the geometry object and peak the closest intersection GeoPoint to the ray
      Parameters:
      ray - The intersect ray (Ray)
      Returns:
      The closest intersection point (GeoPoint)

    • calcGlobalEffects

      private Color calcGlobalEffects​(Intersectable.GeoPoint intersection, Ray ray, int level, double k)
      Calculate all the continues rays effects (A.K refraction and reflection)
      Parameters:
      intersection - The intersection point
      ray - the intersect ray
      level - the number of the rest layers the ray can go throw (the depth of the recursion)
      k - Attenuation factor
      Returns:
      The effected color (Color)

    • calcGlobalEffect

      private Color calcGlobalEffect​(Ray ray, int level, double kx, double kkx)
      Recursion function to calculate all the chaining (continuous) effects
      Parameters:
      ray - The intersect ray
      level - The number of the rest layers the ray can go throw (the depth of the recursion)
      kx - Attenuation factor (x for reflection or refraction (transparency))
      kkx - Attenuation factor after Attenuation
      Returns:
      The color of the point (Color)

    • constructReflectedRay

      private Ray constructReflectedRay​(Point3D point, Vector v, Vector n)
      Calculate the reflected ray
      Parameters:
      point - The intersect point
      v - The direction of the light ray
      n - The normal vector of the geometry in the intersection point
      Returns:
      The reflected ray (Ray)

    • constructRefractedRay

      private Ray constructRefractedRay​(Point3D point, Vector v, Vector n)
      Calculate the refracted ray
      Parameters:
      point - The intersection point
      v - The direction of the light ray
      n - The normal vector of the geometry in the intersection point
      Returns:
      The refracted ray (Ray)
